page.title: 17SPARETIME
page.content: I interviewed 60 children and asked them what they did in their spare time.15% of the children do dancing in their spare time.100% of the children watch TV in their spare time.85% of the children do sport, 45% do hobbies 15% of the children do work.75% of the children play.I was surprised that only 5% did computing.5% also did gardening and 5% went shopping.10% went places like Edinburgh and some went to Pony Shows.10% visit relations and 5% go to church on Sunday. I thought that this was strange so I asked them again if they went to church or visited their grans and the 5% changed to 20% and 10% changed to 60%.
